targetSentence: Il est toujours gentil avec ses amis.
englishSentence: He is always nice to his friends.
albanianSentence: Ai është gjithmonë i sjellshëm me miqtë e tij.

targetSentence: Elle fait ses devoirs tous les jours.
englishSentence: She does her homework every day.
albanianSentence: Ajo i bën detyrat e shtëpisë çdo ditë.

targetSentence: Nous avons beaucoup de travail à faire.
englishSentence: We have a lot of work to do.
albanianSentence: Kemi shumë punë për të bërë.

targetSentence: Je vois un oiseau dans le jardin.
englishSentence: I see a bird in the garden.
albanianSentence: Unë shoh një zog në kopsht.
